# Set Up
```{r Load Packages}
packages <- c("tidyverse", "haven", "dplyr","igraph", "reshape2", "qgraph")
lapply(packages, function(pkg) {
  if (!requireNamespace(pkg, quietly = TRUE)) {
    install.packages(pkg)
  }
  library(pkg, character.only = TRUE)
})
```
